name: Random Switch
description: A switch that can randomly set local variables based on triggers.
InternalName: ランダム切り替えスイッチ

fields.name: Trigger Variable
fields.description: The local variable number that triggers or activates this actor.

fields.name: Set by this actor 1
fields.description: A local variable number that can be set by this actor.

fields.description: A local variable number that can be set by this actor.

fields.name: Set by this actor 3
fields.description: A local variable number that can be set by this actor.

fields.name: Set by this actor 4
fields.description: A local variable number that can be set by this actor.

fields.name: Time in milliseconds
fields.description: The time in milliseconds that determines the switch's interval.
